sentences.sContent: The average Dutchman pedals 541 miles per year.
sentences.sContent_eng: The average Dutchman pedals 541 miles per year.
sentences.sCn: 荷兰人平均每人每年骑车541英里。

sentences.sContent: At midnight, the Dutchman came within site of the graveyard.
sentences.sContent_eng: At midnight, the Dutchman came within site of the graveyard.
sentences.sCn: 午夜时分，这个荷兰人进入了公墓地界。

sentences.sContent: One cold winter night, early in the New Year, a certain Dutchman left the tavern in Tarrytown and started walking to his home in the hollow nearby.
sentences.sContent_eng: One cold winter night, early in the New Year, a certain Dutchman left the tavern in Tarrytown and started walking to his home in the hollow nearby.
sentences.sCn: 某年伊始的一个寒冷冬夜，一个荷兰人离开塔利镇的小酒馆，徒步向自己在附近山谷中的家走去。

phrases.pCn: 飞翔的荷兰人；大直径单烘缸；侧引滑车
